name: The Back of the Computer
description:
Whatever lied back in the depths of early game dev has arrived now. Find out the meaning of the wasd keys, become bored,  face your fears, deal with a cockroach infestation and more in this game pack. Brace yourself. It's sure to be terrible.

-------------------------------------------------

So I decided to release some old games of mine onto the web. They were too short to garner individual releases. If this does well, I might release another one. It just depends. Anyways, Enjoy!

-------------------------------------------------

Games included:

  • At the Empire State Building And You Are a Big Chicken
  • BASEMENT
  • Exit
  • WASD
  • When Boredom Strikes
